item.description:
He's back......Dave Brouillette that is!!

Dave is one of the original band members, check out more information on Dave and his deal on their website: http://dontcallmeshirley.info/index.html

Let's go check out the acoustic duo sounds of Dave & Kevin (only) play at David's Tavern in Newburyport where they will be  going back where Don't Call Me Shirley began, as an acoustic duo having fun as they do a set w with the first incarnation of DCMS. This will be fun!  

Let's meet early, grab some tables get some dinner, chat, and sit back and listen to Dave & Kevin jam.  They are playing from 7-10pm, not sure how long we will stay but it should be fun to check them out. Check out David's website: http://davidstavernandrestaurant.com/

Please remember that if you have not paid your dues for this year, be prepared to pay them at this event.  If you need to find out if you owe money, please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer”, we thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

Looking forward to seeing you,

Donna & Janet
item.name: DCMS goes Acoustic, with a special guest........
